definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: Crypt Fiend pathing size slightly increased.
sentences.chinese: 地穴恶魔的碰撞体积稍微增大。

sentences.english: The Kergrim will use some of the standard Kergrim attacks.
sentences.chinese: 地穴怪会使用一些标准的地穴怪攻击方式。

sentences.english: The Kergrim will use some of the standard Kergrim attacks.
sentences.chinese: 地穴怪会使用一些标准的地穴怪攻击方式。

sentences.english: In this room there are many cave claws and kergrim fighting eachother.
sentences.chinese: 房间内有许多洞穴妖怪和地穴怪正在相互打斗。

sentences.english: The Indian men gathered in the kivas for special ceremonies.
sentences.chinese: 印第安男人在地穴里聚会，举行特殊仪式。

sentences.english: Dwarves are hardy mountain kin which live in the earth and rugged places of the land.
sentences.chinese: 矮人是山岩之王，他们住在地穴或者崎岖不平的地方。

sentences.english: It also has eight underground rooms called kivas.
sentences.chinese: 它还有八个地下室，叫做大地穴。

definition: underground palace (as part of imperial tomb)
Dongkou county in Shaoyang 邵陽|邵阳[Shao4 yang2], Hunan
a room for keeping sth hidden/secret room/hidden chamber
